import React from 'react' import { makeStyles } from '@material-ui/core/styles' import Typography from '@material-ui/core/Typography' import img1 from "./img1.jpg" const useStyles = makeStyles((theme) => ({ root:{ display:"flex", justifyContent:"space-around", alignItems:"center", minHeight:"100vh" }, img:{ width:"100%", display:"block", transform:"scale(1.3)", transition:"all 0.3s ease-out", opacity:10, '&:hover': { transform:"scale(1.2) transLateY(-1px) ", } }, description:{ position:"relative", left:"0px", bottom:"280px", width:"100%", padding:"15px", textAlign:"center", color:"#FFF3FA", fontSize:"18px", height:"auto", overflow:"hidden", }, heading:{ marginBottom:"15px", color:"#fff", fontWeight:700, fontSize:"2rem", transform:"translateY(30px)", }, mon:{ color:"#ED5E93",fontWeight:700,fontSize:"2rem" }, uicard:{ width:"350px", overflow:"hidden" }, button:{ color:"#fff", background:"red", display:"inline-block", padding:"10px 25px ", textDecoration:"none", borderRadius:"5px" } })) const Recom = () => { const classes=useStyles() return ( <>
